div.p: RAY: Your answers suggest your values are important to you and you're thinking seriously about making this plan happen.
RAY: Now think about it this way—when steaks on the grill are ready, you don't cook them longer, you act, by taking them off the grill and eating.
RAY: It sounds like your plan is ready, and it's time to act—to take the next step and start your plan. Now, since you're ready to set a date to begin.
